desc-with-translation.zh: 当使用复选框组时，该属性才会生效，表示复选框选中时，将被保存在复选框组的 modelValue 中的值。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: This property takes effect when a checkbox group is used and represents the value that will be saved in the checkbox group's modelValue when the checkbox is selected.

desc-with-translation.zh: 这是复选框组的属性，表示复选框能选中的最少项。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: This is the property of the checkbox group and represents the minimum number of items that the checkbox can select.

desc-with-translation.zh: 这是复选框组的属性，表示复选框能选中的最多项。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: This is the property of the checkbox group and represents the maximum number of items that a checkbox can select.

desc-with-translation.zh: 这是复选框组的属性，表示当超过复选框能选中的最多项时，自动取消选中此前最早选中的那个复选框。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: This is a property of the check box group that automatically deselect the earliest check box when the maximum number of items that a check box can select is exceeded.

desc-with-translation.zh: 这是复选框组的属性，表示选中的复选框的 value 属性值列表。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: This is the property of the check box group and represents the list of value property values for the selected check box.
Check the contents to the left of the box
Check the contents to the right of the box

desc-with-translation.zh: :data-index='index' 是必要的，当选择下拉列表项时，它在内部被用于找到该下拉列表在 options 中对应的值。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: :data-index='index' is necessary when selecting a drop-down list item, it is used internally to find the value corresponding to that drop-down list in options.

desc-with-translation.zh: 该属性需要配合 multiple 使用，用于指定能选择的项的最大数量。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: This property needs to be used with multiple to specify the maximum number of items that can be selected.

desc-with-translation.zh: 该属性需要配合 maxValues 使用，当选择的项的数量超过最大数量时，自动替换掉最开始选择的那一项。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: This property needs to be used in conjunction with maxValues. When the number of selected items exceeds the maximum number, the first selected item is automatically replaced.

desc-with-translation.zh: 该属性需要配合 maxValues 使用，当选择的项达到 maxValues 时，是否关闭下拉列表。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: This property must be used with maxValues. When the value reaches maxValues, determine whether to close the drop-down list.
